isis.stitle: HYDRO-MAX II BRAKE MONITOR SYSTEM - SWITCH ADJUSTMENT - 0358560C1

svcproc.title: 0358560C1
svcproc.para: To adjust the 0358560C1 push button switch that is used as a pair, the following procedure is followed:

step1.para: Install upper switch with PAL nut on rear side of switch bracket, finger tight.
Connect lead for test light #1 and adjust switch until light just goes off. Note position of key/tab on connector body.
Hold PAL nut and turn switch in (rotate clockwise) one full turn. Key/tab should be in same position as step two.

note.para: Test light should be off and switch set so pedal must be moved 0.050 inch at point of contact to make test light come on.

step1.para: Tighten PAL nut and watch key/tab so switch is not turned.
Install lower switch with PAL nut on rear side of switch bracket, finger tight.
Connect lead for test light #2 to lower switch.
Adjust the lower switch so that when the pedal is depressed, both lights come on at the same time.

svcproc.para: If test light #2 (lower switch) comes on first, move the lower switch closer to pedal.
If test light #1 (upper switch) comes on first, move the lower switch away from pedal.

step1.para: Tighten PAL nut on both switches and test one more time.
Remove test lights and install connector with circuits 70/70A and 70B/70C on upper switch and connector with circuits 90A and 90B on lower switch.
